distance.description: The max distance that avatars can be spotted at

peripheral_distance.description: The maximum pheripheral vision. -1 means that the value of 'distance' is used.

back_distance.description: The maximum backward distance. -1 means that the value of 'distance' is used.

angle_horizontal.description: The horizontal angle of the cone

angle_vertical.description: The vertical angle of the cone

sight_node.description: [string]Node from which the entity sees, usually the head node.

use_sight_node_for_direction.description: [bool]Use the sight node rotation (influenced by animation etc) instead of the unit root node rotation for determining sight direction.

vision_raycast_template.description: The raycast template to use for vision.

eye_type.description: The form of the sight area.

ignore_inside_foliage_distance.description: If the target is within foliage and we are withing ignore_inside_foliage_distance, ignore hits to the foliage. (Players hiding in bushes)

inside_foliage_distance.description: If the target is within this distance of a foliage hit
